import numpy as np
import os
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from numpy import linalg as LA
import scipy
from scipy.linalg import subspace_angles
from scipy.stats import ortho_group
import seaborn as sns
from scipy import signal


sns.set_theme()

[2]:

class sparseGMD:
    def __init__(self, X, H, Q, K, lu=None, lv=None):
        self.n = X.shape[0]
        self.p = X.shape[1]
        # to store the original data
        self.data = X
        self.H = H
        self.Q = Q
        # k is the rank for GMD specified in advanced
        self.K = K
        # initialize parameters for iterations
        self.X = X
        self.u = np.zeros(self.n).reshape(self.n, 1)
        self.v = np.zeros(self.p).reshape(self.p, 1)
        self.d = np.zeros(1)
        # initialze paramters for controlling iterations
        self.max_iter = 250
        self.threshold = 1e-5
        # initialize parameters for output
        self.U = np.zeros(self.n * self.K).reshape(self.n, self.K)
        self.V = np.zeros(self.p * self.K).reshape(self.p, self.K)
        self.D = np.zeros(self.K)
        # input of penalized parameter
        if lu:
            self.lu = lu
        else:
            self.lu = 0
        if lv:
            self.lv = lv
        else:
            self.lv = 0

    def soft_thresholding(self, l, x):
        p = np.shape(x)[0]
        return np.sign(x)*np.maximum(np.zeros((p, 1)), np.abs(x)-l)

    def compute_norm(self, A, vec):
        # A is the matirx specifying the normed-space with size n * p
        # vec is a vector with shape p * 1, p is any natural number
        # norm is given as (v^t)Av
        result = np.matmul(np.transpose(vec), A)
        result = np.matmul(result, vec)
        return np.sqrt(result)

    # initialize u and v
    # u_k = v_k = [0,...,1,0,...,0]
    def initialize_uv(self, component):
        self.u = np.zeros(self.n).reshape(self.n, 1)
        self.v = np.zeros(self.p).reshape(self.p, 1)
        # self.u[0] = 1
        # self.v[0] = 1
        if component >= (self.n - 1):
            self.u[0, 0] = 1
        else:
            i = 1
            self.u[component, 0] = 1
            while True:
                temp = np.matmul(np.transpose(self.u), self.H)
                temp = np.matmul(temp, self.u)
                if temp < 0:
                    self.u[component + i, 0] = 1
                    i = i + 1
                else:
                    break
        self.v = np.zeros(self.p).reshape(self.p, 1)
        if component > (self.p - 1):
            self.v[0, 0] = 1
        else:
            j = 1
            self.v[component, 0] = 1
            while True:
                temp = np.matmul(np.transpose(self.v), self.Q)
                temp = np.matmul(temp, self.v)
                if temp < 0:
                    self.v[component + j, 0] = 1
                    j = j + 1
                else:
                    break

    # update u and v for once
    def compute_uv_vector(self):
        cons_u = np.matmul(self.X, self.Q)
        cons_v = np.matmul(np.transpose(self.X), self.H)
        # compute u
        u_nscale = self.soft_thresholding(self.lu, np.matmul(cons_u, self.v))
        u_norm = self.compute_norm(self.H, u_nscale)
        self.u = (u_norm > 0) * u_nscale / u_norm
        # compute v
        v_nscale = self.soft_thresholding(self.lv, np.matmul(cons_v, self.u))
        v_norm = self.compute_norm(self.Q, v_nscale)
        self.v = (v_norm > 0) * v_nscale / v_norm

    def compute_d(self):
        temp = np.matmul(np.transpose(self.u), self.H)
        temp = np.matmul(temp, self.X)
        temp = np.matmul(temp, self.Q)
        self.d = np.matmul(temp, self.v)

    def compute_X(self):
        new_mass = self.d * np.matmul(self.u, np.transpose(self.v))
        self.X = self.X - new_mass

    def GMD_fit(self):
        # iterates over rank
        for component in range(self.K):
            # update u,v
            self.initialize_uv(component)
            # u_0 and v_0 serves as a placeholder for results in previous iteration
            u0 = self.u
            v0 = self.v
            error = 1
            num_iter = 0
            # keep computing till convergence or reach the maximum iterations
            while error > self.threshold:
                # compute u and v
                self.compute_uv_vector()
                num_iter = num_iter + 1
                # validate whether the algorithm converges
                error = LA.norm(self.u - u0, 2) + LA.norm(self.v - v0, 2)
                # prepare for the next iteration
                u0 = self.u
                v0 = self.v
                if num_iter > self.max_iter:
                    # print('the algorithm does not converge after',
                    #       self.max_iter, 'iterations')
                    # print('rank', self.K)
                    # print('column', comp)
                    break
            # u_k and v_k are determined, update the output matrices U and V
            self.U[:, component] = self.u.reshape(self.n)
            self.V[:, component] = self.v.reshape(self.p)
            # update d via the given u and v
            self.compute_d()
            self.D[component] = self.d
            # update X
            self.compute_X()

    def GMD_result(self):
        # the result is given as UDV^t
        component = np.matmul(self.U, np.diag(self.D))
        self.fitted_value = np.matmul(component, np.transpose(self.V))
        return self.fitted_value

    #  Error evaluation method of GMD
    def compute_QH_norm(self, A):
        numeric_1 = np.matmul(self.H, A)
        numeric_2 = np.matmul(self.Q, np.transpose(A))
        result = np.trace(np.matmul(numeric_1, numeric_2))
        return np.sqrt(result)

    def GMD_error(self):
        _ = self.GMD_result()
        return (self.compute_QH_norm(self.X - self.fitted_value))

[3]:

class SparseIgPCA:
    def __init__(self, X1, X2, H, Q1, Q2, sigma, phi_1, phi_2, r1, r2, job_id):
        self.X1 = X1
        self.X2 = X2
        self.H = H
        self.Q1 = Q1
        self.Q2 = Q2
        self.r1 = r1
        self.r2 = r2
        self.threshold = 0.7
        self.sigma = sigma
        self.phi_1 = phi_1
        self.phi_2 = phi_2
        self.id = job_id

    def separate_GMD(self, X, H, Q, rank, lu = None, lv = None):
        model = sparseGMD(X = X, H = H, Q = Q, K = rank, lu = lu, lv = lv)
        model.GMD_fit()
        X_tilde = model.GMD_result()
        return_list = tuple((model.U, model.D, model.V, X_tilde))
        return(return_list)

    # compute the inner product of two vectors/matrices under H-norm
    def H_inner_prod(self, u, v):
        a = np.matmul(np.transpose(u), self.H)
        a = np.matmul(a, v)
        return a

    def joint_ingredient(self):
        # Fit X1 and X2 by GMD separately
        self.U1, self.D1, _, self.X_1_tilde = self.separate_GMD(
            self.X1, self.H, self.Q1, self.r1)
        self.U2, self.D2, _, self.X_2_tilde = self.separate_GMD(
            self.X2, self.H, self.Q2, self.r2)

    def joint_rank_evaluation(self, threshold=None):
        if (threshold):
            self.threshold = threshold
        joint_prod = self.H_inner_prod(self.U1, self.U2)
        _, self.s, _ = LA.svd(joint_prod, full_matrices=False, compute_uv=True)
        self.r0 = sum(self.s > self.threshold)
        print('r0 = ' + str(self.r0))

    def joint_fit(self, lv1=None, lv2=None):
        U_joint = np.concatenate((self.U1, self.U2), axis=1)
        p_joint = np.shape(U_joint)[1]
        # Fit the joint part
        joint_gmd = sparseGMD(U_joint, self.H, np.eye(p_joint), self.r0)
        joint_gmd.GMD_fit()
        self.U0 = joint_gmd.U
        L = joint_gmd.U
        proj = np.matmul(L, np.transpose(L))
        self.J1 = np.matmul(proj, self.H)
        self.J1 = np.matmul(self.J1, self.X_1_tilde)
        self.J2 = np.matmul(proj, self.H)
        self.J2 = np.matmul(self.J2, self.X_2_tilde)
        _, self.signal_1, self.V01, self.J1_hat = self.separate_GMD(
            X = self.J1, H = self.H, Q = self.Q1, rank = self.r0, lv = lv1)
        _, self.signal_2, self.V02, self.J2_hat = self.separate_GMD(
            X = self.J2, H = self.H, Q = self.Q2, rank = self.r0, lv = lv2)

    def individual_fit(self, lv1=None, lv2=None):
        ind_1 = self.X_1_tilde - self.J1
        ind_2 = self.X_2_tilde - self.J2
        self.u1, self.d1, self.v11, self.A1 = self.separate_GMD(
            X = ind_1, H = self.H, Q = self.Q1, rank = self.r1-self.r0, lv = lv1)
        self.u2, self.d2, self.v12, self.A2 = self.separate_GMD(
            X = ind_2, H = self.H, Q = self.Q2, rank = self.r2-self.r0, lv = lv2)

    def forward(self, threshold, r0):
        self.joint_ingredient()
        if (r0):
            self.r0 = r0
        else:
            self.joint_rank_evaluation(threshold)
        self.joint_fit()
        self.individual_fit()

    def complete_estimation(self):
        self.X_1_hat = self.J1_hat + self.A1
        self.X_2_hat = self.J2_hat + self.A2

[4]:

def M_generation(U, V, d):
    s = len(d)
    M = np.dot(d * U[:, :s], V[:, :s].T)
    return M

def X_generation(H, Q, M, noise_level):
    n, p = np.shape(M)
    noise = np.random.normal(0, 1, (n, p))
    v1, p1 = LA.eig(H)
    v2, p2 = LA.eig(Q)
    L = np.matmul(np.matmul(p1, np.sqrt(np.diag(1/v1))), p1.T)
    R = np.matmul(np.matmul(p2, np.sqrt(np.diag(1/v2))), p2.T)
    noise = L @ noise @ R
    X = M + noise * noise_level
    return(X,noise * noise_level)

[5]:

def SNR(M, Sigma, Phi, noise_level):
    numer = np.trace(M.T @ M)
    deno = np.trace(np.sqrt(noise_level)*Sigma) * np.trace(np.sqrt(noise_level)*Phi)
    return numer/deno

def principle_angle(A, B):
    angle = subspace_angles(A, B)
    return(1 - np.cos(angle[0]))

[6]:

def principle_angle(A, B):
    angle = subspace_angles(A, B)
    return(1 - np.cos(angle[0]))

[7]:

def compute_QH_norm(A, H, Q):
    numeric_1 = np.matmul(H, A)
    numeric_2 = np.matmul(Q, np.transpose(A))
    result = np.trace(np.matmul(numeric_1, numeric_2))
    return np.sqrt(result)

[8]:

def data_info(U, V, H, Q, d0, d1, N, M, X, scale):
    A = compute_QH_norm(np.dot(d1[0] * U[:, 1:2], V[:, 1:2].T), H, Q)**2
    J = compute_QH_norm(np.dot(d0[0]* U[:, :1], V[:, :1].T), H, Q)**2
    E = compute_QH_norm(N, H, Q)**2
    tot = compute_QH_norm(X, H, Q)**2
    snr = SNR(M,LA.inv(H), LA.inv(Q1), scale)
    print('The following metrics as given as: individual, joint, noise, snr')
    return(A/tot, J/tot, E/tot, snr)

## read correlated data
U = np.loadtxt('files/U_0.8.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)
H = np.loadtxt('files/H_0.8.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)
U1 = U[:, [1,0]]
U2 = U[:, [1,2]]
V1 = np.loadtxt('files/V1_0.8.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)
Q1 = np.loadtxt('files/Q1_0.8.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)
V2 = np.loadtxt('files/V2_0.6.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)
Q2 = np.loadtxt('files/Q2_0.6.csv', delimiter=",", dtype=float)

[10]:

def igpca_eva(X1, X2):
    model2 = igPCA(X1, X2, H, Q1, Q2, LA.inv(H), LA.inv(Q1),
               LA.inv(Q2), r1=2, r2=2, job_id=[0,0])
    model2.forward(r0=1, threshold=None)
    model2.joint_estimation()
    model2.complete_estimation()
    u0_igpca = model2.U0
    v11_igpca = model2.v11
    v12_igpca = model2.v12
    v01_igpca = model2.V01
    v02_igpca = model2.V02
    u1_igpca = model2.u1
    u2_igpca = model2.u2
    x1_igpca = model2.X_1_hat
    x2_igpca = model2.X_2_hat
    print('igPCA Done')
    # evaluations
    M1_igpca_fro = LA.norm(x1_igpca-M1, 'fro')/LA.norm(M1, 'fro')
    M2_igpca_fro = LA.norm(x2_igpca-M2, 'fro')/LA.norm(M2, 'fro')
    u0 = principle_angle(U1[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), u0_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    u1 = principle_angle(U1[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), u1_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    u2 = principle_angle(U2[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), u2_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v01 = principle_angle(V1[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), v01_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v02 = principle_angle(V2[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), v02_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v11 = principle_angle(V1[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), v11_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v12 = principle_angle(V2[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), v12_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    print('M1, M2, U0, U1, U2, V01, V02, V11, V12')
    return(M1_igpca_fro, M2_igpca_fro, u0, u1, u2, v01, v02, v11, v12)

[11]:

def jive_eva(X1, X2):
    n, p1 = np.shape(X1)
    _, p2 = np.shape(X2)
    model2 = igPCA(X1, X2, np.eye(n), np.eye(p1), np.eye(p2), np.eye(n), np.eye(p1), np.eye(p2),
                   r1=2, r2=2, job_id=[0,0])
    model2.forward(r0=1, threshold=None)
    model2.joint_estimation()
    model2.complete_estimation()
    u0_igpca = model2.U0
    v11_igpca = model2.v11
    v12_igpca = model2.v12
    v01_igpca = model2.V01
    v02_igpca = model2.V02
    u1_igpca = model2.u1
    u2_igpca = model2.u2
    x1_igpca = model2.X_1_hat
    x2_igpca = model2.X_2_hat
    print('JIVE Done')
    # evaluations
    M1_igpca_fro = LA.norm(x1_igpca-M1, 'fro')/LA.norm(M1, 'fro')
    M2_igpca_fro = LA.norm(x2_igpca-M2, 'fro')/LA.norm(M2, 'fro')
    u0 = principle_angle(U1[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), u0_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    u1 = principle_angle(U1[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), u1_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    u2 = principle_angle(U2[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), u2_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v01 = principle_angle(V1[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), v01_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v02 = principle_angle(V2[:,0].reshape(-1, 1), v02_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v11 = principle_angle(V1[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), v11_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    v12 = principle_angle(V2[:,1].reshape(-1, 1), v12_igpca.reshape(-1, 1))
    print('M1, M2, U0, U1, U2, V01, V02, V11, V12')
    return(M1_igpca_fro, M2_igpca_fro, u0, u1, u2, v01, v02, v11, v12)

[12]:

def H_inner_prod(H, u, v):
    a = np.matmul(np.transpose(u), H)
    a = np.matmul(a, v)
    return a

[13]:

def BIC(X, M_hat, V, H, Q):
    n, p = np.shape(X)
    res = X - M_hat
    logloss = np.log(compute_QH_norm(res, H, Q)**2/(n*p))
    sps = np.sum(V > 1e-5)
    complexity = sps* np.log(n*p)/(n*p)
    result = (logloss+complexity)
    return result

# begin data tuning
for i in range(64):
    for j in range(64):
        model.joint_fit(lv1= l[i], lv2 = l[i])
        model.individual_fit(lv1= l[j], lv2= l[j])
        model.complete_estimation()
        v11_spigpca = model.v11
        v01_spigpca = model.V01
        x1_igpca = model.X_1_hat
        v12_spigpca = model.v12
        v02_spigpca = model.V02
        x2_igpca = model.X_2_hat
        bic1 = BIC(X1, x1_igpca, np.concatenate((v11_spigpca, v01_spigpca), axis=None), H, Q1)
        bic_1[i,j] = bic1
        bic2 = BIC(X2, x2_igpca, np.concatenate((v12_spigpca, v02_spigpca), axis=None), H, Q2)
        bic_2[i,j] = bic2

fig, axes = plt.subplots(2, 3, figsize=(14, 8))
plt.tight_layout(h_pad=2)
sns.heatmap(V1[:,0].reshape(11,11), ax=axes[0, 0], cbar=True, cmap=sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(V1[:,0].reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[0, 0].set_xlabel('')
axes[0, 0].set_ylabel('')
axes[0, 0].set_title('True V01')
sns.heatmap(v01_igpca.reshape(11,11), ax=axes[0, 1], cbar=True, cmap= sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(v01_igpca.reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[0, 1].set_xlabel('')
axes[0, 1].set_ylabel('')
axes[0, 1].set_title('igPCA V01')
sns.heatmap(v01_spigpca.reshape(11,11), ax=axes[0, 2], cbar=True, cmap= sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(v01_spigpca.reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[0, 1].set_xlabel('')
axes[0, 1].set_ylabel('')
axes[0, 2].set_title('Sparse igPCA V01')
sns.heatmap(V1[:,1].reshape(11,11), ax=axes[1, 0], cbar=True, cmap = sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(V1[:,1].reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[1, 0].set_xlabel('')
axes[1, 0].set_ylabel('')
axes[1, 0].set_title('True V11')
sns.heatmap(v11_igpca.reshape(11,11), ax=axes[1, 1], cbar=True, cmap= sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(v11_igpca.reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[1, 1].set_xlabel('')
axes[1, 1].set_ylabel('')
axes[1, 1].set_title('igPCA V11')
sns.heatmap(v11_spigpca.reshape(11,11), ax=axes[1, 2], cbar=True,cmap= sns.color_palette("vlag", as_cmap=True),mask=(v11_spigpca.reshape(11,11)==0))
axes[1, 1].set_xlabel('')
axes[1, 1].set_ylabel('')
axes[1, 2].set_title('Sparse igPCA V11')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('spatial.png')
plt.show()

[38]:

model = SparseIgPCA(X1, X2, H, Q1, Q2, LA.inv(H), LA.inv(Q1),
                   LA.inv(Q2), r1=2, r2=2, job_id=[0,0])
model.r0 = 1
model.joint_ingredient()
model.joint_fit(lv1= 0)
model.individual_fit(lv1 = 0)
model.complete_estimation()
v11_igpca = model.v11
v01_igpca = model.V01
x1_igpca = model.X_1_hat
v12_igpca = model.v12
v02_igpca = model.V02
x2_igpca = model.X_2_hat
print('BIC of current model')
print(BIC(X1, x1_igpca, np.concatenate((v11_igpca,v01_igpca), axis=None), H, Q1))
print(BIC(X2, x2_igpca, np.concatenate((v12_igpca,v02_igpca), axis=None), H, Q2))

BIC of current model
0.2760449550551779
0.04619078570374912

[30]:

# range of lambdas
model = SparseIgPCA(X1, X2, H, Q1, Q2, LA.inv(H), LA.inv(Q1),
                   LA.inv(Q2), r1=2, r2=2, job_id=[0,0])
model.r0 = 1
model.joint_ingredient()
bic_1 = np.zeros((64,64))

[39]:

# begin data tuning
for i in range(64):
    for j in range(64):
        model.joint_fit(lv1= l[i])
        model.individual_fit(lv1= l[j])
        model.complete_estimation()
        v11_spigpca = model.v11
        v01_spigpca = model.V01
        x1_igpca = model.X_1_hat
        v12_spigpca = model.v12
        v02_spigpca = model.V02
        x2_igpca = model.X_2_hat
        bic1 = BIC(X1, x1_igpca, np.concatenate((v11_spigpca, v01_spigpca), axis=None), H, Q1)
        bic_1[i,j] = bic1

[40]:

ind_1 = np.unravel_index(np.argmin(bic_1, axis=None), bic_1.shape)
print('whether the lambdas are chosen on the edge of the gird')
print(ind_1)
print(np.min(bic_1))
model.joint_fit(lv1= l[ind_1[0]], lv2 = l[ind_2[0]])
model.individual_fit(lv1 = l[ind_1[1]], lv2 = 10)
model.complete_estimation()
v11_spigpca = model.v11
v01_spigpca = model.V01
x1_igpca = model.X_1_hat
v12_spigpca = model.v12
v02_spigpca = model.V02
x2_igpca = model.X_2_hat

[143]:

# range of lambdas
l = [i*0.1 for i in range(1,51)]
model = SparseIgPCA(X1, X2, H, Q1, Q2, LA.inv(H), LA.inv(Q1),
                   LA.inv(Q2), r1=2, r2=2, job_id=[0,0])
model.r0 = 1
model.joint_ingredient()
bic_1 = np.zeros((50,50))
bic_2 = np.zeros((50,50))

[144]:

# begin data tuning
for i in range(50):
    for j in range(50):
        model.joint_fit(lv1= l[i], lv2 = l[i])
        model.individual_fit(lv1= l[j], lv2= l[j])
        model.complete_estimation()
        v11_spigpca = model.v11
        v01_spigpca = model.V01
        x1_igpca = model.X_1_hat
        v12_spigpca = model.v12
        v02_spigpca = model.V02
        x2_igpca = model.X_2_hat
        bic1 = BIC(X1, x1_igpca, np.concatenate((v11_spigpca, v01_spigpca), axis=None), H, Q1)
        bic_1[i,j] = bic1
        bic2 = BIC(X2, x2_igpca, np.concatenate((v12_spigpca, v02_spigpca), axis=None), H, Q2)
        bic_2[i,j] = bic2

[145]:

ind_1 = np.unravel_index(np.argmin(bic_1, axis=None), bic_1.shape)
ind_2 = np.unravel_index(np.argmin(bic_2, axis=None), bic_2.shape)
print('whether the lambdas are chosen on the edge of the gird')
print(ind_1)
print(ind_2)
print(np.min(bic_1))
print(np.min(bic_2))
model.joint_fit(lv1= l[ind_1[0]], lv2 = l[ind_2[0]])
model.individual_fit(lv1 = l[ind_1[1]], lv2 = 10)

ind_2 = np.unravel_index(np.argmin(bic_2, axis=None), bic_2.shape)

model.complete_estimation()

axes[0, 0].set_ylabel('')
